Episodes.Title: Burghley House
Episodes.Plot: Downton Abbey's creator discovers the true stories behind life in some of Britain's great historical houses, beginning with Burghley House in Lincolnshire.

Episodes.Title: Goodwood House
Episodes.Plot: Julian Fellowes visits Goodwood House in Sussex, for 300 years the home of the Dukes of Richmond, descendants of Charles II and his mistress Louise de Kerouaille.
